name: Arcane Conjure
description:
Congratulations! That spell went awry and now you are dead! Don't worry, kid, it happens to everyone. Just resurrect yourself!

Oh, you don't have all the components? No problem - just talk to your dead family members! They'll definitely give you what you need, given that they're your family and all.

Maybe they'll make you do some puzzles.

Who BUILT this house, anyway? Wizards? Oh.

Made in eight weeks for AIE Seattle's Minor Production.
